title: Machine Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: STEM-PjBL Integration for Strengthening Chemistry 4C Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can produce project outcomes applying 4C competencies (critical thinking, creativity, communication, collaboration) to solve real chemistry problems.
Learners can design chemistry experiments integrating STEM elements (science-technology-engineering-mathematics) and convert them into reports and presentation materials.
Through peer assessment during team-based project implementation, learners can reflectively document their learning outcomes at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
